column1: Bitcoin ¡V USD correlation hits 0; here's what it means
column2: Bitcoin's correlation index with the US Dollar reached a remarkable zero, meaning that the king coin's performance will not depend on USD anymore.

column1: How An ¡¥Inconsequential' Mistake Saw Bitcoin Crash To $8,000
column2: Bitcoin is known to be a very volatile digital asset as its price is often wont to rise and fall unexpectedly, and sometimes without a clear reason. One of these instances of the digital asset flash-crashing was back in 2021 when the price of Bitcoin had fallen 87% on some exchanges in a matter of minutes.
